```{r}
trainBitcoin<- window(BitcoinTimeSeries, start = c(2014,1), end= c(2016,1), frequency=365)
testBitcoin<- window(BitcoinTimeSeries, start=c(2016,11), end = c(2016, 12), frequency = 365)

rm(trainBitcoin)
rm(testBitcoin)

trainBitcoin
plot(trainBitcoin)

testBitcoin
plot(testBitcoin)
etsFit <- ets(trainBitcoin[ ,"close"], model = 'ZZZ', damped = FALSE)

bitcointsFC <- forecast(etsFit, h = 60)
autoplot(bitcointsFC, series = "Predicted", 
         xlab = "Time", ylab = "Price")
#+ 
 # autolayer(Bitcoin, series = "Original")
bitcointsFC
accuracy(forecast(etsFit, h = 60), testBitcoin)
```
